overview: From 2025-05-11 to 2025-05-12, elizaos/eliza had 10 new PRs (16 merged), 1 new issues, and 13 active contributors.

completedItems.title: fix(pglite): JSON serialization to handle invalid Unicode escape sequences when log
completedItems.body:
# Relates to

Issue #42: Unicode escape sequence error when creating log entries with TEXT_LARGE model type

# Risks

Low. This fix handles malformed Unicode escape sequences in JSON data to prevent database errors. No impact on exist

completedItems.title: [enhancement] Refactor model handling in AgentRuntime to support provider and priority
completedItems.body:
Refactor model handling in AgentRuntime to support provider and priority. 
Updated ModelHandler type to include provider and optional priority for better model selection. 
Enhanced registerModel and getModel methods to utilize these new f

completedItems.body:
Refactor Twitter plugin code for improved error handling and code clarity. 
Updated maxRetries to be configurable via environment variable, added source property to Twitter interaction messages, and enforced text validation in tweet creati

completedItems.title: Disable loading instrumentation if not enabled.
completedItems.body:
This removes annoying instrumentation logs in startup.

`@elizaos/the-org:dev: [2025-05-11 19:24:33] WARN: [getTracer] Service instrumentation not found in runtime.`

Now it doesn't try and load the runtime, unless `process.env.INSTRUME

completedItems.title: Enforce Typescript on /cli and  /plugin-sql, fix missing DB functions.
completedItems.body:
This PR:

- Turns on `dts: true` in both CLI and plugin-sql packages.

- This exposed missing: `connection` which was being used in tests but didn't actually exist.

- Implemented `getConnection()` for realsies in DB adapters to satis

completedItems.title: remove broken release link in changelog
completedItems.body:
Found a broken link to v0.25.6-alpha.1 release in docs/docs/changelog.md.
Replaced the markdown link with plain text to avoid 404.
Feel free to suggest a working link if available â€” happy to update!

completedItems.title: chore: Cleanup the-org ENV and Agent loading.
completedItems.body:
Some cleanups I did while QAing Jimmy PM agent.

Rewrites the `hasRequiredEnvVars` and Org agent loading process to be much simpler to read and fixes hard coded 6 count of agents.

Does same thing in 50% less code, we do not need to be
